desc: Students examine the antecedents and collapse of the Cold War division of Europen, the growth of the European Economic Community, and its transformation into the European Union as Western European phenomena. The coure also focuses on the working of European Union institutions and consideration of theories of integration. The course ends with the post-communist transformation of 2004 and 2007 entrants and their experience following accession. Prerequisite: Political Science 220. Offered annually or alternate years.
name: Sem: Becoming European
prerequisites: Prerequisite: Political Science 220. Offered annually or alternate years.
title: Becoming European: Central Europe's Entry into the European Union
